TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Halusipun, title = Halusipun, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halusipun} }

S.FORM: Halusipun Itiniay i Xinyi Cen no Nantou ko Halusipun a niyaro', 46 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 128 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 40 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 51 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 60 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 77 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun38 , Amis1 , Cou2 .
